topic.title: Adding an Edit Link to Launch Oxygen XML Web Author

keywords.indexterm: WebHelp Responsive systemAdd Edit link in output to launch Oxygen XML Web Author

body.p: You can embed Edit links in the DITA WebHelp Responsive output that will automatically launch a particular document in . A reviewer can then simply click the link and they will be redirected to the editing page with that particular file open and editable.

section.title: Using Oxygen XML Editor/Author
section.p:
To embed an Edit link in the DITA Map WebHelp Responsive output using a transformation scenario from within Oxygen XML Editor/Author, follow this procedure:
Edit a DITA Map WebHelp Responsive transformation scenario and open the Parameters tab.
Set values for the following parameters:
editlink.remote.ditamap.url - The URL of the DITA Map suitable for opening in .
editlink.web.author.url - The URL of the installation.
Run the transformation scenario.
Result: In the WebHelp output, all topics will have an Edit link to the right side of the title and clicking the link will launch that particular document in .

section.title: Using a Script Outside of Oxygen XML Editor/Author

note.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

section.p:
To embed an Edit link in the DITA Map WebHelp Responsive output using a script outside of Oxygen XML Editor/Author, follow this procedure:
Specify URL values for the following parameters:
editlink.remote.ditamap.url - The URL of the DITA Map suitable for opening in .
editlink.web.author.url - The URL of the installation.
Execute the transformation script.
Result: In the WebHelp output, all topics will have an Edit link to the right side of the title and clicking the link will launch that particular document in .

For example:
Windows:
dita.bat -i c:\mySample.ditamap -f webhelp-responsive -Deditlink.remote.ditamap.url=webdav-https://dav.box.com/dav/my.ditamap -Deditlink.web.author.url=https://www.oxygenxml.com/webauthor.html
Mac OS X/ Linux:
dita -i C:/mySample.ditamap -f webhelp-responsive -Deditlink.remote.ditamap.url=webdav-https://dav.box.com/dav/my.ditamap -Deditlink.web.author.url=https://www.oxygenxml.com/webauthor.html
